doc:
Kristen Johnston https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kristen_Johnston 0 Kristen Angela Johnston (born September 20, 1967) is an American actress. She is known for her role as Sally Solomon in the television series 3rd Rock from the Sun. She also starred as Wilma Flintstone in The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas and as Holly Franklin in the sitcom The Exes. Kristen_Angela_Johnston ( born September_20_,_1967 ) is an_American_actress . She is_known for her_role as Sally_Solomon in the_television_series_3rd_Rock from the_Sun . She also starred as Wilma_Flintstone in The_Flintstones in Viva_Rock_Vegas and as Holly_Franklin in the_sitcom The_Exes .
